title: Raiders!
description: A wild roving band of outlanders Shouts from the compound gate: Give us food, water and power or die!

options.text: Old-Timer - Evacuate everyone deep inside. Quickly!
options.outcome: Miners drop supplies in a panic. Not everyone makes it inside.

options.text: Beck - We must avoid bloodshed. Give them what they want.
options.outcome: You begrudgingly hand over the supplies. Most of the crew seems upset with the decision, but thankful to be alive
We lost some good men, but the raiders didn't know what hit them. We even captured their supply wagon.
